mapper.insert: insert into affi( af_name, af_tel, af_email, af_title, af_homepage, af_content, af_file) values( #{af_name}, #{af_tel}, #{af_email}, #{af_title}, #{af_homepage}, #{af_content}, #{af_file})
mapper.select: select * from(select b.*, @rownum:=@rownum+1 rn from affi b, (select @rownum:=0) as tmp order by AF_no desc) as boardlist where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
